p: Worse overall survival was observed for patients in the decision-tree-derived Cluster 7, a liver predominant-severe phenotype, ▲Liver +10 (HR=1.72; 95% CI: 1.01-2.93; P=0.04) compared with patients in other clusters. Cluster 6, a mixed phenotype, ▲Mouth +5 Eye +2 GI +1, was a novel group with worse overall survival, found after ruling out the other phenotypes in the decision tree (HR=1.75; 95% CI: 1.02-2.98; P=0.04).
